main event: On November 5, 1957, a grain buyer named Reinhold O. Schmidt reported encountering a large UFO approximately three miles southeast of Kearney, Nebraska, claiming to have spent about 30 minutes on board the craft talking with its occupants.
interesting points: Witness described the UFO as 100 feet long and 30 feet wide, resting on four metal supports., The occupants were dressed in ordinary clothing and spoke in broken English mixed with German., A bright flash of light from the ship caused his car to stall and momentarily paralyzed him., Physical evidence such as a greenish oil and footprints were reportedly found at the site., Schmidt's mental health was questioned after his report, leading to a commitment to a mental hospital based on claims of hallucination.
witness description: Reinhold O. Schmidt, a grain buyer from California, age 48
